item.description:
Hi Folks,
I sure could use some help setting up our food court for the drag race event.
please come on down to Bullock hangar at 5:oo pm
We will drag out the grills , tables, tents choose our prime location and set up for a fun day of watching the drag cars and cooking for the racers.
the more hands we have the faster the setup.

 

Hey.  we also could use some more help on the day of the event.  what ever you can do  from a few hours to all day all are welcome!!
item.how_to_find_us: If you dont have a badge call my cell when at the gate 978-257-2751

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Set up for Orange Drag event
